author: shazron
msg: Improved build script in Xcode4 template, checks whether the 'www' folder was added as a folder reference and adds a warning if applicable.

author: shazron
msg: Modified Xcode3 template not to copy the phonegap.*.js files in every single time from PhoneGapLib.
Removed script that automatically updated the script tag to the new phonegap.*.js
Added warning if phonegap.{VER}.js or phonegap.{VER}.min.js is not referenced in your HTML file(s).

author: shazron
msg: Added W3C Network Information API stub in Javascript (attached to navigator.connection)
